Subinterfaces of WritingModeTraitsGetter in org.apache.fop.traits
 interface WritingModeTraitsSetter
          This interface provides read and assignment access to FO traits related to writing mode.
 

Classes in org.apache.fop.traits that implement WritingModeTraitsGetter
 class WritingModeTraits
          This class provides a reusable implementation of the WritingModeTraitsSetter interface.
 

Methods in org.apache.fop.traits that return WritingModeTraitsGetter

          Helper function to find the writing mode traits getter (if any) that applies for a given FO node.
